Submodules¶

nacelle.core.decorators module¶

Simple function decorators for common tasks (rendering templates/json, making requests deferrable, etc.)

nacelle.core.decorators.render_handlebars(template_name)[source]¶

Decorator that renders the decorated function with the given handlebars template.

nacelle.core.decorators.render_jinja2(template_name)[source]¶

Decorator that renders the decorated function with the given handlebars template.

nacelle.core.decorators.render_json(view_method)[source]¶

Decorator that renders the decorated function as JSON

nacelle.core.dispatcher module¶

Custom dispatcher for nacelle that implements session support

nacelle.core.dispatcher.nacelle_dispatcher(router, request, response)[source]¶

Override dispatch to provide session support

nacelle.core.exception_handlers module¶

nacelle.core.exception_handlers.handle_500(request, response, exception)[source]¶

Report any uncaught errors to sentry and let the user know something’s gone wrong
